subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1756 is on the way
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Christopher Coy,    You can use this link to track it, it has now gone through customs and is expected to arrive for you around the 6th.  https://www.track718.us/zh-CN/detail?nums=JSEXZ1947067656YQ
